benchmark_details.name: SC2Arena
benchmark_details.overview: SC2Arena is a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating LLMs in StarCraft II, supporting full-length game context, all races, full action spaces, and agent-vs-agent gameplay.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate large language models in complex decision-making tasks in the context of StarCraft II.

data.source: Comprehensive gameplay data from StarCraft II

methodology.calculation: Standardized calculation methods for each metric based on gameplay data.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Elo ratings and win rates indicate superior performance; lower time and resource costs denote efficient strategies.
methodology.validation: Extensive testing against built-in AI and competitive agents.
